column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Came in to experience their deep dish pizza. not that crowded on a saturday afternoon. but man the wait for a pizza was sure long. I was surprised by the lack of fillings
column2: was expecting it to be somewhat deeper. anyway
column3: spent about 8 bucks for a personal size house special sausage pizza
column4: wish there was more meat. oh well.
